DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim of this study is to use MRI methods to evaluate and compare brain structure and function in two groups of full-term neonates at two-weeks of age: those born of obese mothers and those born to normal weight mothers.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Maternal Body Composition on Offspring Brain Structure and Function
DOC.criteria: the participant must be enrolled in the Arkansas Children's Nutrition Center (ACNC) Glowing study and be about 2 weeks of age +/ 3days none specified
